node.title: Which of the nominations should win the 2007 Academy Award for Best Picture?
node.author: Petruchio

data.field: [http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0449467/|Babel] [http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0407887/|The Departed] [http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0498380/|Letters from Iwo Jima] [http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0449059/|Little Miss Sunshine] [http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0436697/|The Queen] What do you mean, "[http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0366548/|Happy Feet]" wasn't nominated for Best Picture!?! I'm writing my nomination in below
